# Assignment 11 - Complete The Code

### Task 
Write one line of code after **Write Your cout Code Here** comment, to get the value **300** without editing any variable value.

---

### Provieded Code 
```cpp
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  // Do Not Edit Below
  int a = 210, b = -50, c = -40;

  // Write Your cout Code Here

  return 0;
}
```
